Install
=========

This is where you write how to get a new laptop to run this project.

Requirements
============

* Python 2.7.3
* MongoDB 2.4
* Mongoengine 0.8

Dependencies
============

Django Tables 2
BeautifulSoup
goatools
numpy
fisher
django-celery
wikitools
SOAPpy
Fabric
django-sorting


Other Softwares
***************

* Genome Analysis Toolkit 2.6-5
* VEP 
* vcftools 0.1.10
* tabix
* Snpeff
* Snpsift

Installation
============

sudo apt-get install python-pip python-dev build-essential zlib1g-dev libmemcached-dev

pip install Fabric
fab install

pip install -r requirements.txt
